Lots of random bits and pieces lying around at the [Place du Jeu de Balle](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Place+du+jeu+de+balle/@50.8371515,4.3458005,19z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x47c3c5b307594bd9:0xad0a2e815edacf2b!8m2!3d50.8370466!4d4.3458723!16s%2Fg%2F11vc2jvct5?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDQxNi4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNjM5SAFQAw%3D%3D) (Old Market) Flea Markets in Brussels.
